Label.en: At first it was just an open space where merchants could set up their street stalls, but later, parts of the market were enclosed by walls or houses..and so was the cemetary
Label.fr: Au début, le marché était un espace de plein air où les marchands pouvaient installer leurs étals. Ensuite certaines parties ont été entourées de murs et de maisons...tout comme le cimetière
Label.es: At first it was just an open space where merchants could set up their street stalls, but later, parts of the market were enclosed by walls or houses

Label.en: There actually was a popular pillory there... all the way until 1786!
Label.fr: Il y avait aussi un pilori très populaire... actif jusqu'en 1786 !
Label.es: There actually was a popular pillory there... all the way until 1786!
Label.zh: There actually was a popular pillory there... all the way until 1786!

Label.en: (alleged) criminals were put on display for hours... while being pelted by pedestrians. Don't worry though, stones were forbidden
Label.fr: Les malfaisants (supposés) étaient livrés à la moquerie et bombardés de détritus par les passants. Les pierres étaient cependant interdites !
